p: Significant differences in the distribution of two HIV-1 CRF: CRF63_02А1 and CRF02_AG СА should be noted. Individual cases of HIV-1 CRF02_AG СА registration have been observed in all Russian regions beginning from the 2000s. Usually, HIV-1 CRF02_AG СА infected women who reported HS contacts with people from Central Asia, while men belong to the PWID group.
